short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the status of all your jobs in jenkins

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Professional Jenkins job monitor for DevOps teams and hardcore developers, monitor jobs in real time, over multiple servers, pick and choose the jobs you want to monitor.
